statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 68100. If she receives a raise of 5300 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-68100 = 31900. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{31900}}{{5300}}={6.0188679245283} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 7 years.
